A check-cashing kiosk that helps you meet short-term financial goals

The problem

People in low income neighborhoods don't have many tools to help them save for short-term financial goals. They do not make enough money to benefit from traditional banking services. The underbanked earn little or no interest on their savings and lose money to fees. The unbanked spend much of their hard-earned money to Check Cashing services with predatory practices.

Become a beta tester

Our solution

Goal is a check-cashing kiosk in community spaces like barbershops, beauty salons, and bodegas. It encourages users to learn the value of savings by encouraging them to meet short-term financial goals. It is a purpose-driven, hyper-local, accessible solution that encourages saving while providing a non-predatory check-cashing service.

Join our mailing list

Feature highlights

Goal kiosks will be equipped with a printer that enables users to:
Print receipts for deposit or check-cashing transactions -
Print QR coupons that are redeemable at partner stores -
Print campaign fliers & other marketing materials to promote their goal in the community. -
Print a schedule to help visualize the timeline to reach their goal. -
